title: The Grey (2012) 720p iTunes
description:
The Grey (2012) 117 min

DESCRIPTION:
After their plane crashes in Alaska, six oil workers are led by a skilled huntsman to survival, but a pack of merciless wolves haunts their every step. (with audio commentary from writer/director Joe Carnahan, editors Roger Barton and Jason Hellman)

SPECS IN BRIEF:
M4V file for iTunes/iDevices
V: 1280x532 23.98 fps h.264 @ 3000 Kbps
A: 160 Kbps 2.0 AAC & 384 Kbps 5.1 AC-3 / 96 Kbps AAC 2.0 (commentary)
S: English & English SDH
C: 20 (Numbered)

SOURCE:
The.Grey.2011.1080p.BluRay.DTS.x264-ESiR

A FEW WORDS ABOUT THIS ENCODE:
Because its INCREDIBLY grainy, this film doesn't look good even at 3000 Kbps. Chapter 09, from 47:20 to 51:10, has bad pixelation that doesn't go away even at max (5,000 Kbps) AppleTV 1 settings. I'm mentioning this because this was requested and I want to manage expectations. So please, NO WHINING.

PLAYBACK:
Encoded & tagged for iTunes and Apple devices (iPad, iPhone 4, etc) that can handle HD video, including *all* versions -- 2007, 2010, 2012 -- of the AppleTV set top box.
